title: Upcoming Poro Wardskins
body: I really like that Riot is getting more permanent ward skins into the store (Mecha, Dragonslayer, Battlecast,...) but I was wondering if the Poro ward skins are going to be permanent or not. As a support I really like ward skins, especially the special ward skins that are not available in the store anymore, and I kinda love to see these wardskins dissapearing again ;)

replies.body: All six of them will be legacy.
I hope they aren't. They don't seem very Christmas-y TBH. Also, we just need some poro wards in general. {{summoner:31}}
Yh well I hope they aren't, but they are not very christmas-y indeed, and the 3 last poro wards are not gonna get released with Poro King gamemode, but with the next patch, in January... ;l
The 6 poro skins probably aren't permanent.
